episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch01:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] found Morty
looking troubled.
Oh hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Yep. You can definitely...

Well, actually, my friend is inviting me to come
and play.
But this friend loves pulling pranks.

The invitation was written on the wall in
bright red letters.
“You are invited to a fun party.”
That’s what it said. I think it’s playful and cute.

Have you noticed by now? This is an invitation
from a ghost Pokémon.

I was thinking of bringing you as well... Would
you like to join me?
(Say I wanna go!)
I knew you’d say that!
(Say I’m scared but curious)
Don’t worry. If anything happens, I’ll protect you.

I was thinking that if I was gonna invite anyone to
a party, it’d have to be you.

I was worried about inviting you, because some
people get scared.

I bet we’ll have a fun time since you can
understand the hearts of Pokémon.
I’d like you to learn how nice they are.

On that day, I’ll introduce you to my friends who
come out at night. Hope you’re excited!

[Name:PlayerNickname ] came to the forest at
night with Morty.

This is a place where many ghost Pokémon who’ve
sneaked away from their Trainers gather at night.
Something is looking at us. It’s Haunter.

Do you want to get close? He might lick you
from happiness.

They do say that if you get licked, it’ll take
your life...
I’m sorry! I’m just joking!
Oh...

You’re wondering why there are balloons?
Those are Drifloon.
Stories say that they drag children to the afterlife.
*chuckle* No need to brace yourself.

There’ve been times when Drifloon tried to take
children away but got pulled around instead.
Should we try to grab them?
Just kidding!

Hehe, this is really fun! It makes me want to stay
till morning.
Thanks for tonight.
This is a relaxing moment amidst my training.

I might have embarrassed myself today by being
so excited.

You’ve helped me experience many things since
I came to Pasio.

So I wanted you to know about the time I
treasure, too.
(Say it was thrilling!)
I’m so happy you enjoyed it!
(Say it was interesting!)

That’s great! Interest is the first step
toward understanding!
They seem like they like you, too.

Next time, you might be the one to receive
an invitation.

If that happens, I’d be really happy if you could
invite me along, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
